Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2014 05:24PM crazy1 wrote: I just found two lumps one in each breast.  I had a mammogram and ultrasound.  They are 98% positive they both are fibroadenomas.  I had one when I was 23 and had to have it removed because it was painful.  I am really worried about them even though they are pretty positive they are both fibroadenomas.  I am 40 now.  I have a lot of cancer in my family and just get very scared thinking I could have it too.  I don't know how to quit worrying about it.  They said to just wait and watch them.  I keep thinking the worst.  I am supposed to go back to the dr. in 3 months to have them checked again.
Posts.Title: Worried 24 Mimikay23 crazy1
